channel.title: Data Science Portfolio on Vincent DongHoon Lee
channel.description: Recent content in Data Science Portfolio on Vincent DongHoon Lee

item.title: Project 2. Web Analytics for Quality Alloys
item.description: For this first group porject I built a web analytics frame using R to analyze website to improve sales. This case study was from Columbia Business School case works and the team analyze the data using R. R code can be read in Github repository. Pain Point : Incapable of developing a website that generates consumer interest, builds customer retention, and furthers brand recognition Findings : 5% average of visitors converts to customers decline to 3% of potential visitors in promo period 38% traffic increase in post-promo period Weight of alloy sold during promo declined by 24.

item.title: Project 1. Before you go to DMV for driver's license
item.description: For this first porject I built a python text game to check various points using game format. Using a main conceptual framework such as loop, printing, conditional statetment, nested function gamer can get the usefule information before their first visti to DMV. Pain Point : Too simple or complicated to make checklist Solution : Make text game to memorize the important things Link to Github Repository
